name: @bcgov/citz-imb-kc-css-api
description: BCGov Pathfinder CSS SSO API integration as addon to citz-imb-kc-express package.
author: Brady Mitchell <braden.mitchell@gov.bc.ca>

scripts.bundle:dts: node bundle-dts.mjs && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs && node remove-dts.mjs && rm build/utils/*.d.ts
scripts.pack: npm i && npm run build && npm run bundle:dts && npm cache clean --force && npm pack && mkdir releases && mv *.tgz ./releases/
